plot: This documentary was created for the DVD release for Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003). It features behind the scenes footage and plenty of cast and crew interviews to inform us how this film was put together.
title: Una epopeya en el mar: Cómo se hizo 'Piratas del Caribe: La maldición de la perla negra'
plot_es: This documentary was created for the DVD release for Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003). It features behind the scenes footage and plenty of cast and crew interviews to inform us how this film was put together.
original_name: An Epic at Sea: The Making of 'Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl'
plot_en: This documentary was created for the DVD release for Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl (2003). It features behind the scenes footage and plenty of cast and crew interviews to inform us how this film was put together.
